verses.text: \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w luxuriant|strong="H1238"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, yielding \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* himself. \w The|strong="H3190"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*, \w the|strong="H3190"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*. \w The|strong="H3190"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* land produced, \w the|strong="H3190"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* sacred \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H7703"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H7703"\w* devious; \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* must bear \w their|strong="H7703"\w* guilt. \w The|strong="H6258"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w break|strong="H6202"\w* \w down|strong="H6202"\w* \w their|strong="H7703"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* demolish \w their|strong="H7703"\w* sacred \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revere|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*?”

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* mere \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* oaths \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w covenants|strong="H1285"\w*. \w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* springs \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w poisonous|strong="H7219"\w* \w weeds|strong="H7219"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w furrows|strong="H8525"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w calf|strong="H5697"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*.\f + \fr 10:5 \ft Beth-aven means house of wickedness. This is a derogatory term for Bethel, which means house of God; see 1 Kings 12:28–29.\f* \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w idolatrous|strong="H3649"\w* \w priests|strong="H3649"\w*— \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*— \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w exile|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w Yes|strong="H1571"\w*, \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Assyria \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* great \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 10:6 \ft Or to King Jareb\f* Ephraim \f + \fr 10:6 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verse 11\f* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w seized|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w shame|strong="H1317"\w*; \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* ashamed \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* wooden idols.\f + \fr 10:6 \ft Or of its own counsel\f*

\w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w carried|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* twig \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w surface|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Aven \f + \fr 10:8 \ft Or of wickedness; Aven is a reference to Beth-aven (a derogatory term for Bethel); see verse 5.\f* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*— \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thistles|strong="H1863"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* overgrow \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, “\w Cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*!” \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, “\w Fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*!”\f + \fr 10:8 \ft Cited in Luke 23:30; see also Revelation 6:16.\f*

\w Since|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w remained|strong="H5975"\w*. \w Did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5932"\w*?\f + \fr 10:9 \ft Or Did not the battle overtake the sons of iniquity in Gibeah?\f*

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w chasten|strong="H3256"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* please; \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* gathered \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H8147"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* bondage \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* transgression.

Ephraim \w is|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w well-trained|strong="H3925"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w that|strong="H3063"\w* loves \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w*; \w but|strong="H2790"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* place \w a|strong="H3068"\w* yoke \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w fair|strong="H2898"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w harness|strong="H7392"\w* Ephraim, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w plow|strong="H2790"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w break|strong="H1758"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hard ground.

\w Sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*; \w break|strong="H5214"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* unplowed \w ground|strong="H5215"\w*. \w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w comes|strong="H1875"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sends \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* upon \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w rain|strong="H3384"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w reaped|strong="H7114"\w* \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* eaten \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w lies|strong="H3585"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* own \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* roar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortresses|strong="H4013"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* demolished \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w Shalman|strong="H8020"\w* \w devastated|strong="H7703"\w* \w Beth-arbel|strong="H1009"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* mothers \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w dashed|strong="H7376"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*. \w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H7837"\w* dawns, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w utterly|strong="H1820"\w* \w cut|strong="H1820"\w* \w off|strong="H1820"\w*.
